name: Hotel Moliceiro
description: Enjoy a cozy stay at Hotel Moliciero, located along the picturesque canals of Aveiro. Our comfortable rooms and friendly atmosphere make it the perfect base for exploring the city.

name: Secret Surf School
description: Ride the waves with Secret Surf School. Our professional instructors offer surf lessons for all levels, providing an exhilarating sports experience amidst the stunning coastal scenery of Aveiro.
street: Avenida Fernandes Lavrador, Pte. da Barra 234, Gafanha da Nazaré

name: Ramona
description: Indulge in Aveiro culinary delights at Ramona, a vibrant food market offering burguers and other delicious dishes. With a lively atmosphere and diverse menu, Ramona is the perfect spot for a casual meal.

name: Aveiro Museum
description: Immerse yourself in Aveiro culture and history at Aveiro Museum. Explore exhibits showcasing the city maritime heritage, traditional crafts, and archaeological finds.

name: Bar Offshore
description: Enjoy a relaxing drink at Offshore, one of Aveiro iconic cafés. Sip on a delicious coffee or indulge in a refreshing beverage while soaking in the vibrant atmosphere of Aveiro.

name: Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro
description: Rejuvenate your body and mind at Massage Therapy Aveiro - Namaste Massagem Aveiro. Our holistic treatments, including massages and yoga classes, promote relaxation and well-being in the heart of Aveiro.

name: BusWay Aveiro
description: Explore Aveiro with ease using BusWay Aveiro convenient transportation services. Our modern buses and friendly drivers ensure a comfortable and hassle-free travel experience around the city.

name: MyWay Kite&Surf School
description: Embark on an exciting adventure with MyWay Kite&Surf School. Learn to kitesurf or windsurf under the guseridance of experienced instructors, and enjoy an adrenaline-pumping experience on the waters of Aveiro.

name: Café Central
description: Relax and unwind at Café Central, a charming café in the heart of Aveiro. Indulge in a cup of coffee, sample delicious pastries, and enjoy the cozy ambiance of this popular local spot.

name: Taberna Octopus Board Games
description: Gather your friends and family for a fun-filled gaming experience at Taberna Octopus Board Games. Choose from a wide selection of board games, enjoy delicious snacks and drinks, and create lasting memories in Aveiro.
street: Rua Capitão de, R. Cap. Sousa Pizarro 28 A, 3810-076
